entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
